name: Dance Dance Electrocution
description:
Dance Dance Electrocution is a little rhythm game where you dance to avoid live wires.

Electrocution is no joke, folks. Serious business.

Music:

Juhani Junkala - Adventure Stage 1

Disyman - Robot Loop

Juhani Junkala - Boss Fight

Sprites:

https://danieldiggle.itch.io/sunnyside
